item.title: Beogram 4000: Adjustment of the Tonearm Height and Tracking Force
item.description:
I’m currently restoring a Beogram 4000 turntable, and with the major tasks complete, I’ve shifted my focus to the finer points. One detail that caught my eye was the tonearm’s resting position, which was noticeably higher than the sensor arm when lifted. [Image] Although this doesn’t impact sound quality, it was aesthetically displeasing. After consulting the manual, which recommended aligning the tonearm height with the sensor arm, I made the adjustment...
